channel.title: INtravel
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Hurricane Melissa: What to know about the catastrophic storm's impact on travel
item.description: Hurricane Melissa made landfall in Cuba as a Category 3 storm Oct. 29.
